item.title: Getting started with Spring Roo
item.description: For those who are not familiar with it, Spring Roo is an open source tool that provides rapid application development of Java applications, using standard Java technologies underneath. Last week I gave a presentation (slides) about how to start using Spring Roo to some co-workers in Telef√≥nica Digital. I have recorded a video with captions for those who couldn’t attend (use fullscreen mode and 720p). The video does not cover some interesting aspects about Spring such as Spring Data (I will write a post about it), or how to completely remove Spring Roo from your project (right button > Refactor > Push In and that is all).
